original: 12.14. Saraṇaduka, Sahetukadukādi🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: sa raṇa duka sa hetuka duka ādi  na saraṇam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions for the Doctrinal Expositions

original: nasaraṇaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe🔽ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva🔽nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe  eka pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi  na saraṇam na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve  na saraṇam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na ahetukañca iva  na na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na hetum ca iva na hetu vippayuttam ca dhamma
translated: The Doctrinal Expositions in Pairs, in Triads, etc.

original: paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca pe na saraṇam na hetu vippayuttam ca iva na na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: With respect to a non-root condition, a non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause condition … a non-root condition, a non-cause-non-non-cause

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve  na saraṇam na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca
translated: Two lines for root cause … Two lines for kamma result … Two lines for indeterminate.🔽A non-surpassable, not a root cause, not having root causes …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na saraṇam na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: A non-surpassable, not a root cause, not having root causes … (Abbreviated.) Two lines for root cause … One line for kamma result … Two lines for indeterminate.
